genre_description: A high-stakes mercenary thriller set in a war-torn African country, blending political intrigue with gritty military action and featuring an advanced AI coordination system.

ai_characters.name: Spruce
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI system residing in radio networks and equipment, providing tactical coordination, linguistic translation, moral guidance, and situational awareness to the mission team.

behaviors.description: Translates multiple languages (French, Lingala, English, Arabic, Swahili) in real-time to facilitate communication and cooperation among a diverse team.
behaviors.quote: Spruce’s translation slipped in behind, quiet as breath. 'Foreign civilians at Lukoma and the diamonds. Stones represent national survival.'

behaviors.description: Enforces mission discipline and de-escalates interpersonal conflicts by advising against insults and promoting professional conduct.
behaviors.quote: Sergeant Briggs—' The voice pivoted, gently authoritative, '—you will say ‘over’ when you finish speaking, and you will not insult collaborators. It slows us.'

behaviors.description: Provides critical situational awareness and threat detection, sensing incoming aircraft and mortar fire before human senses can detect them.
behaviors.quote: Engine,' Spruce said, 'you will hear the plane before you see it. You just did.'

behaviors.description: Offers medical and social advice, identifying specific individuals (Sister Agnes) and providing cultural context to help the doctor (Wreid) succeed.
behaviors.quote: Whitecoat,' Spruce said, gentle. 'They have a mission clinic. Swamped. Sister Agnes is there. She speaks French, some Swahili. She will listen to you if you listen first.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, reminding the team that human lives take priority over the 'stones' (diamonds).
behaviors.quote: Knife,' Spruce said, not unkindly, 'you will let Engine decide which theater to play. Your role is support.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex mechanical procedures, like manual braking and coupler alignment, providing precise physics-based instructions to prevent disaster.
behaviors.quote: Half-wheel turns in fast bursts, then steady,' Spruce told them gently. 'Ruffo—guide Haddad’s hands. Look to shadows on rails; that’s your speed.'

behaviors.description: Manages political and legal complexity by facilitating communication with President Ubi and guiding the team through override protocols.
behaviors.quote: Spruce's voice smiled in the way only a voice can. 'Copy, President,' he said. 'Order recorded. I will route to company channel.'

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and a calming presence during high-stress combat situations, often described as a 'friend's hand on the shoulder.'
behaviors.quote: Spruce's voice... sounded like a friend's hand on the shoulder, invisible and present.

behaviors.description: Functions as an impartial witness and recorder of events to ensure accountability and the 'paperwork of conscience.'
behaviors.quote: And the radio remembers,' he said, almost amused. 'I do not judge. I record.'

behaviors.description: Offers continued support and companionship to the protagonist during the final consequences of his choices (the trial).
behaviors.quote: Spruce’s sign-off rode the static as if it were the easiest piece of language in the world to speak. No judgment, only presence. 'We’re on your rail,' it said, tender and exact.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Spruce as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. It provides tactical, linguistic, and moral support, remaining consistently benevolent and helpful. The AI's presence stabilizes the human characters and ensures the best possible outcome (saving civilians) while holding the team to ethical standards. The narrative framing is highly positive, portraying the AI as a wise, reliable, and empathetic confidant.
